snippet.textDisplay: I think the Frangible comes with the same parts every time, but can come in different elements. I have found 2 and they do the same exact things your gun does. And you are so right, it is woefully under-powered

snippet.textDisplay: The Kaleidosplode is, hands down, the worst gun in the game. It's basically worthless. Also, the Frangible is actually a bugged gun. Frangible is an affix. It's not supposed to be a gun.
snippet.textOriginal: The Kaleidosplode is, hands down, the worst gun in the game. It's basically worthless. Also, the Frangible is actually a bugged gun. Frangible is an affix. It's not supposed to be a gun.

snippet.textDisplay: Some pointers with Chuck. One of the best rolls you can get is replicator homing. Also it can behave strangely with ammo regen as it will interrupt your "fire rate" so Super Soldier users be aware.

snippet.textDisplay: It wouldn't be Borderlands if the weapons weren't weird on some level or another.  In the case of kaleidoscope, inaccuracy is inevitable with a shotgun unless you're at close range.  This looks the kind of weapon you might appreciate more if you're playstyle is up close and personal.  T.K.'s Wave is a carryover from BL 2.
snippet.textOriginal: It wouldn't be Borderlands if the weapons weren't weird on some level or another.  In the case of kaleidoscope, inaccuracy is inevitable with a shotgun unless you're at close range.  This looks the kind of weapon you might appreciate more if you're playstyle is up close and personal.  T.K.'s Wave is a carryover from BL 2.
